heading: 3.7 Glossary of Terms
text: Diminishing returns: production, amount extra output produced extra unit input declines input used. , alternatively, amount input used increasing, requires input produce one extra unit output.Diminishing utility: consumption, amount extra utility/satisfaction/pleasure generated extra unit consumption good declines good consumed.Increasing returns: production, amount extra output produced extra unit input increases input used. , alternatively, amount input used production increasing, requires less less input produce one extra unit output.Increasing utility: consumption, amount extra utility/satisfaction/pleasure generated extra unit consumption good increases good consumed.Marginal benefit: marginal benefit action extra benefit derived one additional unit action.Marginal cost: marginal cost action extra cost incurred carry action one unit.Opportunity cost: opportunity cost action value obtained second-best available option, second-best option chosen.Rationality/rational choice: Rationality means choosing option within constraints limits gets decision maker closest goal, decision maker using available information.
